Package doa.engine.task

Class DoaTasker

java.lang.Object
doa.engine.task.DoaTasker
public final class DoaTasker
extends java.lang.Object
Abstracts threading and all it's related functionality from the common DoaEngine user. This class' methods are not a must to use. If required, any user of DoaEngine can bring their own threading libraries. This class exists purely to provide a sufficient enough tool to write decent programs.
Since:
DoaEngine 1.0
Version:
3.0
Author:
Doga Oruc

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void executeAndWait​(java.lang.Runnable task, java.lang.Runnable after, long waitTime)
    Causes a separate thread to execute the arguments.
    static void executeLater​(java.lang.Runnable task, long waitTime)
    Causes a separate thread to execute the argument after a certain delay.
    static void executeNow​(java.lang.Runnable task)
    Causes a separate thread to execute the argument immediately.
    static void guard​(@NotNull DoaTaskGuard guard, long waitTime)
    Causes a separate thread to guard the execution of a code segment.

  • Method Details

    • guard

      public static void guard​(@NotNull @NotNull DoaTaskGuard guard, long waitTime)
      Causes a separate thread to guard the execution of a code segment. When a code segment is being guarded by a DoaTaskGuard, the segment can only be executed once every waitTime milliseconds.
      Parameters:
      guard - any task guard that was true before this method's invocation
      waitTime - the amount of delay in milliseconds for the guard to stop guarding
      See Also:
      Thread

    • guardExecution

      public static void guardExecution​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.Runnable task, @NotNull @NotNull DoaTaskGuard guard, long waitTime)
      Causes a separate thread to guard the execution of a Runnable. When a Runnable is being guarded by a DoaTaskGuard, the Runnable can only be executed once every waitTime milliseconds.
      Parameters:
      task - the runnable which contains the instructions that should be executed on a separate thread
      guard - any task guard that was true before this method's invocation
      waitTime - the amount of delay in milliseconds for the guard to stop guarding
      See Also:
      Thread

    • executeNow

      public static void executeNow​(java.lang.Runnable task)
      Causes a separate thread to execute the argument immediately.
      Parameters:
      task - the runnable which contains the instructions that should be executed on a separate thread
      See Also:
      Thread

    • executeAndWait

      public static void executeAndWait​(java.lang.Runnable task, java.lang.Runnable after, long waitTime)
      Causes a separate thread to execute the arguments.
      Parameters:
      task - the runnable which contains the instructions that should be executed on a separate thread
      after - the runnable which contains the instructions that should be executed after a certain delay
      waitTime - the amount of delay in milliseconds between the two tasks
      See Also:
      Thread

    • executeLater

      public static void executeLater​(java.lang.Runnable task, long waitTime)
      Causes a separate thread to execute the argument after a certain delay.
      Parameters:
      task - the runnable which contains the instructions that should be executed after a certain delay
      waitTime - the amount of delay in milliseconds
      See Also:
      Thread
